entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sioux Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -24.2°C

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
